setting.name: FEXTOSC
setting.description: FEXTOSC External Oscillator mode Selection bits

option.description: EC (external clock) for 100 kHz to 8 MHz
option.name: ECM

option.description: XT (crystal oscillator) from 100 kHz to 4 MHz
option.name: XT

setting.name: RSTOSC
setting.description: Power-up default value for COSC bits

option.description: EXTOSC with 4x PLL, with EXTOSC operating per FEXTOSC bits
option.name: EXT4X

setting.name: CLKOUTEN
setting.description: Clock Out Enable bit

option.description: CLKOUT function is disabled; I/O or oscillator function on OSC2
option.name: OFF

option.description: CLKOUT function is enabled; FOSC/4 clock appears at OSC2
option.name: ON

setting.name: CSWEN
setting.description: Clock Switch Enable bit

option.description: Writing to NOSC and NDIV is allowed
option.name: ON

option.description: The NOSC and NDIV bits cannot be changed by user software
option.name: OFF

setting.name: FCMEN
setting.description: Fail-Safe Clock Monitor Enable

setting.name: MCLRE
setting.description: Master Clear Enable bit

option.description: MCLR/VPP pin function is MCLR; Weak pull-up enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: MCLR/VPP pin function is digital input; MCLR internally disabled; Weak pull-up under control of port pin's WPU control bit.
option.name: OFF

setting.name: PWRTE
setting.description: Power-up Timer Enable bit

setting.name: WDTE
setting.description: Watchdog Timer Enable bits

option.description: WDT enabled while running and disabled in SLEEP/IDLE; SWDTEN is ignored
option.name: SLEEP

option.description: WDT controlled by the SWDTEN bit in the WDTCON register
option.name: SWDTEN

setting.name: LPBOREN
setting.description: Low-power BOR enable bit

setting.name: BOREN
setting.description: Brown-out Reset Enable bits

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled, SBOREN bit ignored
option.name: ON

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled while running, disabled in Sleep; SBOREN is ignored
option.name: SLEEP

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled according to SBOREN
option.name: SBOREN

setting.name: BORV
setting.description: Brown-out Reset Voltage selection bit

setting.name: PPS1WAY
setting.description: PPSLOCK bit One-Way Set Enable bit

option.description: The PPSLOCK bit can be cleared and set only once; PPS registers remain locked after one clear/set cycle
option.name: ON

option.description: The PPSLOCK bit can be set and cleared repeatedly (subject to the unlock sequence)
option.name: OFF

setting.name: STVREN
setting.description: Stack Overflow/Underflow Reset Enable bit

option.description: Stack Overflow or Underflow will cause a Reset
option.name: ON

option.description: Stack Overflow or Underflow will not cause a Reset
option.name: OFF

setting.name: DEBUG
setting.description: Debugger enable bit

setting.name: WRT
setting.description: User NVM self-write protection bits

option.description: 0000h to 01FFh write-protected, 0200h to 0FFFh may be modified
option.name: BOOT

option.description: 0000h to 07FFh write-protected, 0800h to 0FFFh may be modified
option.name: HALF

option.description: 0000h to 0FFFh write protected, no addresses may be modified
option.name: ALL

setting.name: LVP
setting.description: Low Voltage Programming Enable bit

option.description: Low Voltage programming enabled. MCLR/VPP pin function is MCLR. MCLRE configuration bit is ignored.
option.name: ON

option.description: High Voltage on MCLR/VPP must be used for programming.
option.name: OFF

setting.name: CP
setting.description: User NVM Program Memory Code Protection bit

setting.name: CPD
setting.description: Data NVM Memory Code Protection bit

setting.name: PEIE
setting.description: Peripheral Interrupt Enable

setting.name: GIE
setting.description: Global Interrupt Enable

setting.name: MODE
setting.description: Logic Cell Mode bits

option.name: 1-input D flip-flop with S and R
option.alias: 1-input D flip-flop with S and R

option.name: 1-input transparent latch with S and R
option.alias: 1-input transparent latch with S and R

setting.description: Logic Cell Negative Edge Interrupt Enable bit

setting.description: Logic Cell Positive Edge Interrupt Enable bit

setting.description: Buffer Full Status bit

setting.description: Update Address bit

setting.description: Read/Write Information bit

setting.name: S
setting.description: Start bit

setting.name: P
setting.description: Stop bit

setting.name: D_nA
setting.description: Data/Address bit

setting.name: CKE
setting.description: SPI Clock Edge Select bit

setting.name: SMP
setting.description: SPI Data Input Sample Phase bit

setting.name: SSPM
setting.description: Synchronous Serial Port Mode Select bits

setting.name: CKP
setting.description: SPI Clock Polarity Select bit/I2C Clock stretch

setting.name: SSPEN
setting.description: Synchronous Serial Port Enable bit

setting.name: SSPOV
setting.description: Receive Overflow Indicator bit

setting.name: WCOL
setting.description: Write Collision Detect bit

setting.name: SEN
setting.description: Start Condition Enable/Stretch Enable bit

setting.name: RSEN
setting.description: : Repeated Start Condition Enable bit (Master mode only)

setting.name: PEN
setting.description: Stop Condition Enable bit (Master mode only)

setting.name: RCEN
setting.description: Receive Enable bit (Master mode only)

setting.name: ACKEN
setting.description: Acknowledge Sequence Enable bit (Master Receive mode only)

setting.name: ACKDT
setting.description: Acknowledge Data bit (Receive mode only)

setting.name: ACKSTAT
setting.description: Acknowledge Status bit (Transmission only)

setting.name: GCEN
setting.description: General Call Enable bit (Slave mode only)

setting.name: DHEN
setting.description: Data Hold Enable bit

setting.name: AHEN
setting.description: Address Hold Enable bit (I2C Slave mode only)

setting.name: SBCDE
setting.description: Slave mode Bus Collision Detect Enable bit (I2C Slave mode only)

setting.name: SDAHT
setting.description: SDA Hold Time selection bit (I2C mode only)

setting.name: BOEN
setting.description: Buffer Overwrite Enable bit

setting.name: SCIE
setting.description: Start Condition Interrupt Enable

setting.name: PCIE
setting.description: Stop Condition Interrupt Enable

setting.name: ACKTIM
setting.description: Acknowledge Time Status bit (I2C Slave mode only)

setting.description: INT External Interrupt Enable
